main event: A deep yellow round object with a red tail appeared as a brilliant light in the west and seemed to move north and south.
interesting points: The object was reported as possibly being a balloon, an aircraft, or Venus; The sighting occurred on 18 April 1956; The reporting officer believes this is the same object observed in the area over the past few weeks; The observation lasted for about 10 minutes; The observation was ground-visual.
sighted object: a round deep yellow object with a red tail
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. Wuujan on Route No 1 in Traverse City
